Collection.LongName: NASA P-3B in-situ trace gas measurements NASA P-3B aircraft in-situ trace gas measurement data collected during the first deployment of the Deriving Information on Surface Conditions from Column and Vertically Resolved Observations (DISCOVER-AQ_Aircraft_insitu_TraceGas_Data)
